titles.title: Encouraging further deepening and broadening of the Abraham Accords on occasion of the third anniversary of their signing to continue building bridges towards a lasting peace.
Encouraging further deepening and broadening of the Abraham Accords on occasion of the third anniversary of their signing to continue building bridges towards a lasting peace.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution reaffirms the alliance between the United States and Israel and supports efforts to increase security and prosperity in the Middle East and North Africa in furtherance of the Abraham Accords, which created formal diplomatic ties between Israel and the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, and Morocco.
